data.title: Amitabh Bachchan Posts 51st Wedding Anniversary celebration on Instagram. thanks fans
data.meta_description: Bollywood king Amitabh Bachchan shares heartfelt thanking fans on his and Jaya Bachcan's 51st Wedding Anniversary; Fan from USA makes emotional video
data.meta_site_name: Latest News, Breaking News, LIVE News, Top News Headlines, Viral Video, Cricket LIVE, Sports, Entertainment, Business, Health, Lifestyle and Utility News | India.Com
data.text:
Amitabh Bachchan Shares ‘Glorious Progress Report’ With Jaya Bachchan After 51 Years of Marital Bliss

Fans wished Amitabh Bachchan and his wife Jaya Bachchan on completing 51 years of togetherness. Scroll down to read more.

Bollywood legend Amitabh Bachchan recently expressed his heartfelt gratitude to fans for their love and wishes on his and Jaya Bachchan’s 51st wedding anniversary. The couple, who tied the knot on June 3, 1973, celebrated their milestone with warmth and appreciation from admirers worldwide. Amitabh took to his blog to share his gratitude, writing, “In my most humbling self, may I give my love and affection to all that have wished Jaya and me on our Wedding Anniversary June 3, 2024.”

Reflecting on their journey together, Amitabh fondly mentioned their children, Shweta Bachchan and Abhishek Bachchan, calling them the couple’s “glorious progress report.” He wrote, “51 years of togetherness, 2 progress reports – Shweta & Abhishek and the love and care of all .. My eternal gratitude.”

In a touching gesture, a devoted fan in New York, Sunil Shah, organized a grand gathering to celebrate Amitabh and Jaya’s love story. The event featured a video presentation that highlighted the couple’s life together, including cherished moments with their children and grandchildren, Aaradhya Bachchan, Agastya Nanda, and Navya Naveli Nanda. The video revisited old childhood photos of the Bachchan siblings and paid tribute to the family’s heritage.

Sunil Shah, who has long been an ardent fan of Amitabh, shared his sentiments, saying, “It’s been so many years of being the biggest fan of you, sir. You’re the biggest icon of the country for everyone and especially for me. I will continue to make you proud, and thank you for making this amazing gesture for me by posting. This means the world to me. Thank you for all the love.”

Amitabh acknowledged this heartfelt tribute on his blog, writing, “I want to thank Sunil Shah Ef, from Surat, for his wishes .. he went to New York and put up a video wishing us at Times Square .. so grateful .. He has sent T-shirts as well, which I shall distribute this Sunday.”

Amitabh and Jaya Bachchan’s love story is legendary in Bollywood, with the couple having appeared together in several iconic films, including ‘Guddi’, ‘Ek Nazar’, ‘Bawarchi’, ‘Sholay’, ‘Kabhi Khushi Kabhie Gham’, ‘Abhimaan’, and ‘Chupke Chupke’. Their enduring partnership continues to inspire fans and admirers around the globe.
